summary:
Complimentary Dagger to Myvotri Varefar\'s Masquerade Set.

Simple Reskin of Mehrune\'s Razor for anyones taste. Enjoy! (Anyone)
descriptionHtml:
To install simply drag and drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Folder (Steamapps) or whatever.

Do what you do for any other Texture Mod (Drag and Drop/Replace -> Yes to all)

ONLY CHANGES MEHRUNES DAGGER (and it\'s hilt)

This is the dagger featured in the file \"MASQUERADE JESTER\"

Thanks!
author: WarpAvP2
